name: Save the Children
description: An international organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief, and supports children in developing countries.

name: Doctors Without Borders
description: An international medical humanitarian organization providing aid in crisis zones worldwide.

name: World Wildlife Fund
description: A leading organization dedicated to wilderness preservation and reducing the human impact on the environment.

name: UNICEF
description: The United Nations Children's Fund provides humanitarian and developmental aid to children worldwide.

name: International Rescue Committee
description: A global humanitarian organization that responds to the world's worst crises and helps people survive and rebuild their lives.

name: Oxfam
description: An international confederation working to end poverty and injustice around the world.

name: American Red Cross
description: Provides emergency assistance, disaster relief, and disaster preparedness education in the United States.

name: CARE International
description: Works around the globe to save lives, defeat poverty and achieve social justice.

name: World Vision
description: A humanitarian organization dedicated to working with children, families, and communities to overcome poverty and injustice.

name: Amnesty International
description: Focuses on human rights and campaigns for a world where human rights are enjoyed by all.

name: UNHCR
description: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees helps safeguard the rights and well‚Äêbeing of refugees worldwide.

name: Habitat for Humanity
description: Helps families build and improve places to call home by working alongside them to build affordable housing.
